About me

Welcome to my website. I am a publishing professional living in the Boston area. I’m a problem-solver, and I like to fix things: print books, ebooks, and websites. I am currently available to help you!

Accepting new projects! Get in touch with me on Twitter, LinkedIn, or using the big friendly contact button above.
